Like the title says, this torrent contains 98 Disney movies released between 1937 and 2008. All of them are in French only, without sub-titles. Obviously, whatever came out in the last 5 years is not in there.

A word of warning, this is NOT BluRay quality or even 720p although it comes close. That relatively low-res format can played on old regular TV sets connected to DVD players capable of playing AVI files. Most portable devices and game consoles will have no problem  with them and, of course, any computer newer than the year 2000 should be adequate. Try using VLC on Macs, PC, iOS or Android.	

This torrent is the same one I uploaded earlier. Trois new titles from the Tinkerbell saga have been added.
